column2: Mandala

The Mandala System is a way to organize a state as a circle, or mandala in Sanskrit, around a center of power. The Leaders of Mandala realms acknowledged that they can no longer hope to effectively govern the realms after the pre-event infrastructure has decayed beyond repair, instead they seek to empower their powerbase by waging war for prestige and tribute or giving alms to monks and holy men for piety and political clout.

Holding Songkhran Festival
Sponsor Songkhran Festival
The Songkhran Festival is held annually in the summer by the people of [Root.Capital.GetName]. By sponsoring this event, the locals will look to you with great respect and approval.
Songkhran Begin!
I have given the order that a Songkhran should be held in [Root.Capital.GetName] this summer!
Lets to celebrates.

During the festival, animal shows are a normal sight. What is off, however, is how this trainer mistreated the monkey, beating it until it starts to cry in pain, even though it had not borne fangs to it's master.
I am sickened.
I pointed the sword at this evil cretin and demands the monkey be released.
The monkey deserved it.
I throw a bag of coins in his face and ran away with the monkey in my arm.
An archery competition was organised by a group of wild men at the outskirts of the capital. I decided to make an appearance because the peasant have been flocking there for a while now.
Those are some scary-looking arrows.
The riff-raff shall get nothing from me.
A spectacular sights, reward is in an order.

A troupe of entertainer has been performing in my domain for weeks, unlike the traditional play, they cast a strange but colourful set of characters The main actors of the stage cast themselves as Bad-men, a rich villigante who fight, but never kill, Thor, son of thunder god Phirun and Peter-Men, a child who is cursed to take the form of a half-spider.
A perculiar, but excellent play nonetheless.
What kind of mockery is this? Kick them out!
Talents like this should be rewarded!

Recently, there have been news of a remarkable Jakata storyteller. His storytelling skills are like none other, the problem however, is that he incorporated folk beliefs and hearsay into his story. The monk and zealots courtiers demand action to be taken against this mockery of Buddha's tales.
You shall speaks lie no more.
Your story, tell them to me.
He deserves a place in my court.
Peddler and Merchant have begun to set up shop in Temple vicinity, The Patriarch of Temple has decided to bring this to your attention and demands action.
There will be no punishment.
They will have to peddle elsewhere.
A fortune teller requested audience with you, he offered to reveals your future to you free of charges.
Certain someone will take a liking to you
Your wisdom will be increased thousandfold
Your marriage will be smooth sailing
Your debts shall be repaid
During the peak of the festival, a drunkard has entered the temple premise, said drunkard have been rambling incoherently for an hour and many peasants gathered to see the spectacle.
Convinces them to leave.
Let him stays in the temple.
Have him removed by forces.

Dek Van, a roaming band of delinquent originated in Siam has been spotted by our guards. It is too late to set up the defence now, our remaining option is to be stood guard or offers them hospitality and hope that they return the favors.
I offers them safety, for a price.
I shall seek refuge in my abode, the peasant be damned.
I convinced them to not causes any trouble.
Yogi, an ascetic group of hermit roaming the forest had arrived at the site of the festival. They preached and solicited from the visitor much to the annoyance of the local temple.
Have an audience with them.
Remove them from the fair.
During the peak of the festival, a monk is seen arguing with passer-by in visible anger. He demands the commotion around the temple be ceased.
Ignore the monk.
Stop the celebration.
The Festival was briefly disrupted when a certain merchant was discovered to have been selling stolen goods. The task of handing the verdict falls upon you.
Kill him.
Sell the merchandise.

The Peak of Festivity have been reached, the city, the market is bustling with activity and even your abode is surrounded by sightseer and visitors. It has been taking an uncomfortable amount of time to make an appearance, however, as the capital has been much harder to navigate through.
Do nothing.
Drive some of them out.
Recently, some courtiers have begun to smirk and laugh in my presence. Soon I realized the reason why, the puppeteer at the fair has been making a fool out of me in their show!
Order my guard to make an example out of them.
Invite them to the court.

A herd of elephants have been parading the capital for days now, the rider solicited donation by exploiting the charity of our people who can't stand to see a toiling elephant walking around the city tiredly. Many courtier demanded action.
Arrest him and release the elephants.
What a scary creatures, I dare not interverne.
A mighty creature such as them would not tire easily.
Make the master carry my throne, see how well he fared.
End of Songkhran Festival.
All festival must end, Songkhran is no exception. During the festival, your generosity has been remembered by the people and they will sing praise to your name for a year to come.
It was a great festival.
